overview: When Tuckerville's sheriff Kidd Mane gets back from vacation, he finds himself out of a job and the whole town up in arms: The town's mayor, Mr. Tucker has given Kidd's sheriff badge to a dumb T-Rex named Cliff and intends to turn Tuckerville into a circus with all its inhabitants as main attractions. Will Kidd Mane reclaim his town and return peace and quiet to Tuckerville?
tagline: The town's new mayor is a real...
title: The Lion Kid 2
